1.0.0: This firmware is one of the easiest firmwares to get CFW on.
3.0.0: Homebrew and CFW are available without RCM. Congrats!
5.0.2: Homebrew and CFW is available, but requires RCM.
5.1.0: Homebrew and CFW is available, but requires RCM. Can be downgraded to 5.0.2 under certain circumstances. Updating will lead to loss of CFW and Homebrew for now.
6.0.0: Breaks almost Homebrew and CFW. Don't update!
